name: Droppster
overview:
Droppster is a counter of your online visits that rewards you for browsing the Internet.

Users can record any website visit they make, called a “dropp by”, using the “Dropp by” button and use them to get elite titles and real rewards from our partner websites. They are able to see their personal online stats, share their dropp bys and follow dropp bys of friends or other cool droppsters.

Droppster makes a distinction between Internet users by letting them control and interact with their online activity. It generates a personalized ranking of visitors for any website on the Internet, determines the most active people surfing the Internet and rewards them.

This allows website owners to identify their loyal visitors/clients and preset their target audience, which is why we call this new concept “reverse nanotargeting”.
